long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to get English to Arabic, Hindi, Urdu, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi, Gujarati, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Thai, Marathi, Malay, Yiddish, Welsh, Nepali, Kannada, Punjabi translation. After installing this extension click twice on any word the a popup will show-up containing translations, antonyms, synonyms and so on.
